Title: A Shadow Over Gundargaz
Description:
You look dangerous.

<Toki spits on the ground.>

That's good. We need dangerous. Something is stalking Gundargaz. 

Something mean. 

Something... recent. 

Just before the Coreway collapsed I started getting reports of workers going missing mid-shift. Only thing we've been able to find have been the odd chunk of rock.

Fingers, mostly. 

If you could sniff out what's stalking my town, I'd be in your debt.
ObjectivesText: Track down whatever is hunting the earthen in Gundargaz.
RewardText:
A demon? Escaped from the crashed ruins of a flying magical city?

If you say so. 

I'm just glad it's sorted.
